recommendations.title: Enable RLS on All Tables
recommendations.description: Row Level Security should be enabled on all tables containing user data
recommendations.action: Enable RLS and create restrictive policies

recommendations.title: Review Public Access
recommendations.description: Remove or restrict public access to sensitive tables
recommendations.action: Revoke public privileges on sensitive data

recommendations.title: Implement User-Based Policies
recommendations.description: Create policies that allow users to access only their own data

recommendations.title: Audit Table Access
recommendations.description: Regularly audit who has access to what data
